dmca.title: [Fwd: Fwd: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Illegal website hosted]]
dmca.body:
Now it's in compliance. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Christian Campbell [mailto:christian@hdpublishing.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 05, 2005 4:23 PM
To: Andrea
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com; security@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [Fwd: Fwd: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Illegal website hosted]]

Andrea:

        In conjunction with the below, I positively state:

1. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the
law.

2. I am making the statement that the information in the notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

3. That I am making this claim to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
and all subsidiaries by means of its designated agent, Lance Crosby, Esq.,
Chief Operating Officer, 1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207.

4. My .sig below shall constitute my electronic signature (i.e. 
"Christian Clay Campbell, Director of Information Technology").

5. I may be reached via e-mail at christian@hdpublishing.com and via
telephone at 386-479-6666.

6. Please see e-mail message quoted below for details on the copyrighted
work and the infringing site.

Thanks,

Christian Campbell
--
Christian Clay Campbell
Director of Information Technology
Harris Digital Publishing, Inc.
On Apr 5, 2005, at 4:40 PM, Andrea wrote:

> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
>
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your 
> claim.
>
> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
>
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 05, 2005 10:12 AM
> To: christian@hdpublishing.com
> Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
> Subject: [Fwd: Fwd: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Illegal website hosted]]
>
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the 
> address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
>
>
> - -------- Original Message --------
> Subject: Fwd: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Illegal website hosted]
> Date: Mon, 4 Apr 2005 23:12:14 -0400
> From: Christian Clay Campbell <christian@hdpublishing.com>
> To: abuse@theplanet.com
> CC: Laura Huff <laura@hdpublishing.com>, copyright@theplanet.com
>
> Dear Sir or Madam:
>
>         I am writing for the second time to demand the immediate removal of 
> the web site currently hosted at http://www.hothostweb.com 
> (67.19.247.204).
> The web site hosted at this address is copyrighted material, being 
> parts of our corporate web site hosted at 
> http://www.affiliatesuccess.net.
>
>         My company owns the exclusive rights -- copyrights, trade and
service 
> marks -- to the names Harris Digital Publishing, Inc., Net Detective, 
> Turbo-Surfer, Genealogy Detective, CleanCredit, System Supervisor, and 
> System Detective.  We have in no way authorized the use of the these 
> names or marks in ANY manner by this individual.  Obviously the stolen 
> materials are being used to represent some individual or other entity 
> as HDP, Inc. and this will not be tolerated.
>
>         On behalf of Harris Digital Publishing, Inc., I demand the IMMEDIATE

> removal of this web site from your server(s) and/or network.  This is 
> my second request and legal action will follow if steps are not taken 
> on the part of your company in a timely fashion.  This web site has 
> already been publicized in online forums and is financially damaging 
> to our lucrative and long-standing software affiliate program.  I have 
> previously e-mailed and spoken with your technical support office.  In 
> my opinion, you have had ample time in which to deal with this issue 
> and your continued negligence in this matter is directly contributing 
> to serious damage to my company.
>
>         Please attend to this matter and respond to this e-mail promptly!
>
>
> Christian
> - --
> Christian Clay Campbell
> Director of Information Technology
> Harris Digital Publishing, Inc.
>
> "A question settled by violence, or in disregard of law, must remain 
> unsettled forever."  -- Jefferson Davis
>
> Begin forwarded message:
>
>> From: The Planet Policy Enforcement <abuse@theplanet.com>
>> Date: April 4, 2005 5:18:39 PM EDT
>> To: christian@hdpublishing.com
>> Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
>> Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: Illegal website hosted]
>>
>> Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at 
>> the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
>>
>> Please also be advised that the Point of Contact for The Planet 
>> Policy Enforcement is abuse@theplanet.com
>>
>>
>> -------- Original Message --------
>> Subject: [ABUSE] URGENT: Illegal website hosted
>> Date: Mon, 4 Apr 2005 17:13:19 -0400 (EDT)
>> From: christian@hdpublishing.com
>> To: abuse@theplanet.com
>>
>> Hello,
>>
>> I have attempted to speak directly with _anyone_ in the abuse 
>> department at the number listed in Arin's output for the following IP 
>> address 67.19.247.204, which is given for the web site 
>> http://www.hothostweb.com. My company, Cyberspace To Paradise, Inc., 
>> d.b.a. Harris Digital Publishing, Inc. owns all trademarks and 
>> service marks related to Net Detective and  Harris Digital 
>> Publishing. Someone has stolen our corporate website material and is 
>> hosting it at 67.19.247.204.
>>
>> I was told by "Mike Vu", "team leader" of the technical support 
>> department who answered the phone at the abuse number listed in your 
>> Arin output that I could not and would not be transfered to the 
>> appropriate abuse department and that I MUST email this information 
>> as it was too "petty" to disturb his manager. According to Arin's 
>> policy there must be "accurate upstream Abuse and Technical POCs 
>> visible on the WHOIS record for that block."
>>
>> I must have this person shut down immediately as this site is 
>> stealing money and resources from our company. Please refer to the 
>> Arin output below.
>>
>> Sincerely,
>> Christian Clay Campbell
>> Director of Information Technology
>> Harris Digital Publishing, Inc.
>> _____________________________
>> Search results for: 67.19.247.204
>>
>>
>>
>> OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
>> OrgID:      TPCM
>> Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway
>> Address:    Suite 110
>> City:       Dallas
>> StateProv:  TX
>> PostalCode: 75207
>> Country:    US
>>
>> ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321
>>

>> CIDR:       67.18.0.0/15
>> NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-11
>> NetHandle:  NET-67-18-0-0-1
>> Parent:     NET-67-0-0-0-0
>> NetType:    Direct Allocation
>> NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM
>> NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM
>> Comment:

>> TechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800
>> TechEmail:  abuse@theplanet.com
>>

>> OrgAbuseName:   Abuse
>> OrgAbusePhone:  +1-214-782-7802
>> OrgAbuseEmail:  abuse@theplanet.com
>>

>> OrgNOCName:   Technical Support

>> OrgNOCEmail:  admins@theplanet.com
>>

>> OrgTechName:   Technical Support
>> OrgTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800

>>

>> additional hints on searching ARIN's WHOIS database.
>>
